topics.body:
So I just had an interesting 'pop-up'. I was told that I couldn't use my browser until I paid a £100 fine via entering my bank details. I couldn't close the page or Chrome directly.

So I just ended Chrome through task manager. No more pop-up.

I was searching for a certain mod pack for the Sims 3 (A Doctor Who one) and it was a image site to see a picture of the content. It loaded up and bam, the pop-up appeared.
They must also host other things because there were a _lot_ of porn ads.

Oooooh an image site eh?

Well that explains it.

I fined every time I go to places like Gelbooru or others like -Rule 34- I get pop ups.

They activate when you click the search bar on the site. But funny enough once you exit them out they never pop back up until you leave the browser and go back to the site.
